posts.post_content: I have a red Cobb I'd like to sell, although want to do it in cash at the National. I have plenty of vouches.  If you are interested in pricing/pics and ultimately seeing the card before finalizing the deal, please PM and we can discuss.

Throwing this thread back out there. 
I will be packing this bad boy in AC, if anyone wants to take a look live, let me know and we will arrange it.

Hi,

Please send me pics and price to [url]chuckspestelimination@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks Chuck

Please send pics to [url]wharfrat7624@yahoo.com[/url].

Thank you. 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
